attributes.action: Make inhalers free for students during the COVID-19 pandemic.
attributes.additional_details: Due to lots of part time jobs being lost already. Students are financially suffering and struggling to buy a necessity to help them to breath in a time where it is even more important to.
attributes.background: Any inhaler, Salbutamol etc, should be free for asthmatic students during the Coronavirus pandemic.

rejection.details:
We think this petition is very similar, but affecting a larger number of people:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303386
